name: mplvsca2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2)), wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe)
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe), wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2)))
body.pretty:
‚ä¢ (√ó ` c1)=(√ó ` c2)
‚ä£ (Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå
‚ä£ ((Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(√ó ` c1)=(√ó ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe)
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe), wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
‚ä¢ c0 =(√ó ` c1)
‚ä£ c0 =(√ó ` c2)
‚ä£ (Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå
‚ä£ ((Base ` c2)‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(√ó ` c1)=(√ó ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe), wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2)))

stmt.origin: ressvsca(cfv(cbs, c2), universe, cfv(cvsca, c1), c2, c1)
stmt.pretty: ressvsca((Base ` c2), universe, (√ó ` c1), c2, c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(cbs, c2), universe), wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c1))

stmt.origin: mplval2(c2, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), c3, c4)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c1, co(c3, cmps, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
‚ä¢ c2 =(c1[|`s](Base ` c2))
‚ä£ c2 =(c3[mPoly]c4)
‚ä£ c1 =(c3[mPwSer]c4)
‚ä£ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c1), cfv(cvsca, c1))

-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
‚ä¢ c0 =(√ó ` c1)
‚ä£ c0 =(√ó ` c2)
‚ä£ (√ó ` c1)=(√ó ` c1)
‚ä£ c2 =(c3[mPoly]c4)
‚ä£ c1 =(c3[mPwSer]c4)
‚ä£ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))

‚ä¢ c0 =(√ó ` c1)
‚ä£ c0 =(√ó ` c2)

‚ä£ c1 =(c3[mPwSer]c4)

comment: The scalar multiplication operation on multivariate polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jan-2015.)
